text: The flag of Prince Edward Island, it is consists of a golden lion passant on a red field in the upper portion and a white field charged with three oak saplings and a large oak tree on a green island in the bottom portion. This is bordered on three edges other than the hoist by a fimbriation of alternating red and white rectangles. The ratio of the flag is 2:3. ==Related pages== * Prince Edward Island ==References== Prince Edward Island Category:Prince Edward Island
title: Flag of Prince Edward Island
